title: Lead Programmer - Bachelor FYP
points: Led the development of core application logic using Python and Flask web framework.
Designed and implemented a scalable backend architecture to support growing user demands.
Collaborated with cross-functional team members to deliver a functional prototype that enhanced efficiency and user experience.

title: Scrum Master - Bachelor FYP
points: Facilitated Agile practices by organizing sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives.
Coordinated task allocation and progress tracking to maintain project momentum.
Ensured effective team communication and delivered project milestones on time.

title: Project Leader - Diploma FYP
points: Led a team in developing and delivering the final year project within scope and timeline.
Managed task allocation and progress tracking to ensure efficient workflow.
Fostered team collaboration and communication to achieve successful project completion.
